title: GlamSquad
seo_title: GlamSquad, the leading mobile beauty service
seo_description: WestHouse is pleased to be the exclusive partner of GLAMSQUAD, the leading mobile beauty service.
contents:
WestHouse is pleased to be the exclusive partner of GLAMSQUAD, the leading mobile beauty service. 

GLAMSQUAD makes getting ready for your important business meeting or exciting night out in the city effortless. Their team of expertly-trained hair stylists, makeup artists and manicurists are hand-picked and guarantee consistent, high quality results with each and every appointment. As a WestHouse Resident, schedule hair styling, makeup and nails services in the comfort of your room via the GLAMSQUAD button on your in-room phone or download the GLAMSQUAD mobile app; enjoy a personalized, one-on-one consultation and choose from their signature range of inspirational looks. For more information on services available click here for the complete menu. 

We bring the best of beauty directly to your hotel room. Just sit back, relax and let the pampering begin. #WestHouseGlam 

Hours of operation: 7am to 9pm
